original_text: People will turn against their friends. They will do foolish things. They will boast that they are very important. They will not love God, but instead they will only want to enjoy themselves.
korean_text: 배신하며 조급하며 자만하며 쾌락을 사랑하기를 하나님 사랑하는 것보다 더하며

sentences.original_text: People will turn against their friends
They will boast that they are very important
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신이 매우 중요하다고 자랑할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: but instead they will only want to enjoy themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 대신 그들은 단지 자신을 즐기기만 원할 것입니다
